ValidationRule.description: This rule ensures that we have a completed fact find back from the customer prior to moving the review past the fact find stage. Else, we must have skipped the fact find.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
( ISPICKVAL(OW_status__c, "Provide advice") || ISPICKVAL(OW_status__c, "Complete") )
&&
IF(
NOT( ISBLANK( OW_fact_find__c ) ),
FALSE,
NOT( ISPICKVAL( OW_review_fact_find_status__c, "Skipped" )
||
ISPICKVAL( OW_review_fact_find_status__c, "Complete" )
) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to progress to the provide advice stage, the review fact find must have been completed by the customer or we must have chosen to skip it for this customer.
